name: Evil Red Boss Dude
description:
Oh noes Its a Evil Red Dude We Need to use the Gun To Kill It OH NOES It has 100000 hp But The Gun Is Spamful And Also Don't Touch the Evil Red Dude because He will wipe your game from existence

Update v1.1

Nerfed Evil Red Boss Dude's HP 100000 to 50000

Evil Red Boss Dude's HP Will Now Show On The Top Of The Screen
